Yahel Carmon

Yahel is a Web Analytics Architect at Blue State Digital. As a member of the Analytics team, Yahel works on both internal analytics development and client-specific tracking projects, specializing in technical implementation and experimental analytics.

Learn more »

    • View details »

    Bio

    Prior to joining Blue State Digital, Yahel served as a Web Manager at the University of Pennsylvania, where he managed an online learning site. He previously helped manage online campaigns for J Street as an Technology and Online Assistant through the 2008 campaign.

    Yahel attended McGill University, where he studied Political Science and Economics, and is a member of the Google Analytics Professional program. Currently residing in Brooklyn, he grew up in New York, and is an avid Yankees fan.
